item.description: Northborough Knitting & Needlework is a new community group meeting monthly to enjoy time with other crafters working on knitting and needlework projects. All levels of crafters are invited to attend. Assistance will be available for the following types of projects: knitting & crochet, cross stitch & needlepoint, and crewel & embroidery. Meetings are held on the last Saturday of the month, 2:00 - 4:00pm, starting March 28th, 2009 in the conference room of the new Northborough Public Library. Please join us, there is nothing like the camraderie of fellow crafters when starting or finishing a project!
item.name: Northborough Knitting & Needlework
